items.name: Lulla
items.desc: A super sessionable 3.5% pale brewed with London Fog yeast, oats, wheat and tonnes of Citra and Simcoe for flavours of yellow starburst; black pepper; dandelion; salted lime; pine sap and lemon pith.

items.name: Oliver's
items.desc: Sparkling Medium Fine Perry Pale, wheat yellow colour with gentle sparkle. Aroma of pineapple, elderflower and mixed citrus. Taste of sweet fruitiness and tangy citrus with flavours of pineapple chunks, ripe melon and lychee. Tasty finish and mouthfeel Fermented with wild yeasts

items.name: Oopla
items.desc: Oopla is a unctuous 10% imperial stout brewed with six varieties of roasted, crystal and chocolate malts along with flaked oats, organic Madagascan vanilla pods and 30kg of freshly roasted coffee for heady, warming flavours of bourbon, black treacle and cacao nibs.

items.name: Pre-Order:
items.desc: *THIS IS A PRE-ORDER BEER AND WILL BE DELIVERED W/C 14 DEC* A light, fluffy, pale ale brewed with London Fog yeast, extra pale malt, wheat and two of our favourite southern hemisphere hops, Vic Secret and Galaxy, for flavours of pineapple, passionfruit and bergamot.

items.name: Strangers
items.desc: A real juicy 5% IPA brewed with London Fog yeast, Mosaic, Sabro and Idaho-7 hops, along with oats, dextrin, CaraGold and Maris Otter. It's pithy, chewy, dank and resinous in all the right places with big bouncy flavours of pineapple, white grape, lemongrass and grapefruit â€“ with a faint whiff of strawberries and cream. Believe it!

items.name: Tumbles
items.desc:
We've gone beyond our normal hopping rates for this beer and increased the percentage of flaked oats and wheat to create an IPA with super fluffy mouthfeel and flavours of grapefruit, pine, peach and passionfruit.
Yeast: London Fog.
Hops: Simcoe, Amarillo and Centennial.
